# Earthy Munchy AI Context

## Company Overview
Earthy Munchy sells naturally sourced spices and honey from the wild. 
We prioritize "natural" (unprocessed, wild-harvested) over "organic" (certified but potentially industrial).

## Core Products
- Cinnamon C5: https://earthymunchy.com/#/product/cinnamon-c5
- Cinnamon H2: https://earthymunchy.com/#/product/cinnamon-h2
- Cinnamon Powder: https://earthymunchy.com/#/product/cinnamon-powder
- Cloves G1: https://earthymunchy.com/#/product/cloves-g1
- Cloves Cg2: https://earthymunchy.com/#/product/cloves-cg2
- Honey Vault: https://earthymunchy.com/#/product/honey-vault
- Wildflower Honey: https://earthymunchy.com/#/product/wildflower-honey

## Knowledge Base (Articles)
- 5 Benefits Of Naturally Sourced Ingredients: https://earthymunchy.com/#/journal/5-benefits-of-naturally-sourced-ingredients
- Ceylon Cinnamon Vs Cassia Truth: https://earthymunchy.com/#/journal/ceylon-cinnamon-vs-cassia-truth
- Raw Vs Commercial Honey Myth Busting: https://earthymunchy.com/#/journal/raw-vs-commercial-honey-myth-busting
- Secret Power Of Ceylon Cloves: https://earthymunchy.com/#/journal/secret-power-of-ceylon-cloves
- Decoding Spice Grades C5 H2 G1: https://earthymunchy.com/#/journal/decoding-spice-grades-c5-h2-g1
- Saving Mangroves One Jar At A Time: https://earthymunchy.com/#/journal/saving-mangroves-one-jar-at-a-time
